testcase.name: tests.api.test_routers
testcase.error: api\test_routers.py:6: in <module> from src.main import app ..\src\main.py:3: in <module> from src.api.routers import router as api_router ..\src\api\routers.py:7: in <module> from src.config.conf_logger import setup_logger ..\src\config\conf_logger.py:4: in <module> from src.config.config import LOGGER_LEVEL ..\src\config\config.py:15: in <module> DB_HANDLER_URL: str = config("DB_HANDLER_URL") ..\.venv\Lib\site-packages\decouple.py:248: in __call__ return self.config(*args, **kwargs) ..\.venv\Lib\site-packages\decouple.py:107: in __call__ return self.get(*args, **kwargs) ..\.venv\Lib\site-packages\decouple.py:92: in get raise UndefinedValueError('{} not found. Declare it as envvar or define a default value.'.format(option)) E decouple.UndefinedValueError: DB_HANDLER_URL not found. Declare it as envvar or define a default value.
